name: 10.8 "Where Have All the Floor Boards Gone" Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many years had Kelly and Woody been together as of this episode?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Woody said that yesterday was their three year anniversary of going steady. He got her a key chain. She got him a $300 camera.

questions.text: When Frasier told Lilith to change her hair, how did she react?
questions.correct: Accused him of secretly hating the way her hair looked all these years
options: Accused him of not really loving her all this time
Accused him of trying to change her outside because he didn't like the inside
Thanked him and gave him a big hug and a kiss
questions.explanation:
Accused him of secretly hating the way her hair looked all these years.

	Frasier told the guys he was in a dilemma. If he said change it she'd think he had a problem with how she looked. If he said keep it, she'd think he didn't care.

questions.text: Who had a birthday in this episode?
options: Frasier
Cliff
Sam
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	He told Sam "give me a beer with a candle in it and I'll blow out my liver." No matter what the occasion was, Norm always had beer to celebrate, and when there's no occasion he still had a beer.

questions.text: Which Celtics basketball player was in this episode?
options: Kevin Gamble
Larry Bird
Dee Brown
questions.explanation:
Kevin McHale.

	Kevin McHale was born December 19, 1957. He played with the Celtics from 1980-1993.

questions.text: What did Sam give Norm for his birthday?
options: Celtic season tickets
Kevin McHale as his personal slave
He wiped out Norm's bar tab
questions.explanation:
Celtics team jacket.

	He had it delivered by Kevin McHale. Norm thought first that Sam was giving him Kevin McHale.

questions.text: What did Cliff and Norm argue about?
questions.correct: How many bolts there were on the floor of the Boston Garden
options: How many licks it took to get to the center of a tootsie pop
What year Kevin McHale first played for the Celtics
Who was better the Bradys or the Patridge family
questions.explanation:
How many bolts there were on the floor of the Boston Garden.

	Cliff said 2860 bolts and got his answer from his mother. Norm said 288 bolts and got his answer from a member of the crew who works on the floor.

questions.text: How did Frasier hurt Lilith's feelings?
questions.correct: He laughed at her new hairdo.
options: He called her fat.
He said she resembled a ghost.
He said her dress was not her style.
questions.explanation:
He laughed at her new hairdo.

	When she told him he was hurting her feelings he said, "I'm sorry, your what?" She then left upset. He asked her for another chance but started laughing again.

questions.text: How did Rebecca keep from laughing at Lilith?
questions.correct: She had a mouse trap on her hand.
options: She actually thought Lilith looked good.
She didn't and Lilith got upset with her too.
She was stepping on a nail.
questions.explanation:
She had a mouse trap on her hand.

	Lilith asked Rebecca if her perm made her look ridiculous. Rebecca said "no". When Lilith left, Carla asked Rebecca how she could look at Lilith's hair and not laugh. Rebecca showed Carla the mouse trap on her hand.

questions.text: Frasier apologized to Lilith. How did he keep from laughing?
options: He took a deep breath and thought of something not funny.
He got used to her hair.
He used what Rebecca used.
He bit his tongue hard.
questions.explanation:
He used what Rebecca used.

	He told Lilith he loved her for what she was on the inside, and nothing on the outside could change that. He went to give Rebecca her mouse traps back, but kept one just in case.

questions.text: Did they ever find out how many bolts there were on the floor of the Boston Garden?
options: y
n
questions.explanation:
No.

	Sam confessed to McHale that they never found out. So, Sam, Woody, Cliff, Norm and Kevin went to the Garden and counted the bolts as the show ended.
